participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, Emma has a passion for wellness and enjoys connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I'm often called by a nickname by my friends. I have a toddler. I like to make my own coffee. I'm really into the powers of crystals. I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and a bit uncertain, Jake is navigating his studies and future aspirations while juggling responsibilities.
participant_2.background: I miss my dog every day. I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood. I wear glasses all day. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life. My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.

content.text: Hi there!
Hiya!
I see you are also trying to advertise your juicing bar. I am trying to do the same.
Oh that's great! What are you thinking of doing?
I was thinking of doing a flyer with a coupon for a free juice.
That's a great idea! I was thinking of doing a contest.
What kind of contest?
I was thinking of having people submit pictures of their favorite juicing recipes and then I would give the winner a free juice bar for a year.
That's a really great idea!
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So what do you do for work?
I'm a student at the local university.
Oh that's great! What are you studying?
I'm studying business.
That's awesome! I wish I had studied business.
It's not too late!
Yeah but I'm already too far into my degree.
You could always change your major.
I don't know if I could handle the extra work.
It wouldn't be that bad.
Maybe I'll think about it.
You should
